title: Pump Tractor Secrets That Will CHANGE Your Farming Game Forever #shorts #agriculture #pumptractor

subtasks: Sit on the tractor seat
Operate the steering wheel to direct the machine
Engage the power take-off (PTO) to run the implement
Adjust the throttle to control speed and power output
Check the rearview mirrors to monitor the machine's movement

tasks.task: Attach a wagon to the tractor
subtasks: Approach the tractor with the wagon
Align the wagon with the hitch pin on the tractor
Connect the safety chains to prevent the wagon from uncoupling during operation
Raise the wagon and secure the safety hooks into the lock pins
Position the tractor near a stack or bale of hay
Maneuver the forks to pick up a bale of hay
Lift the bale onto the wagon
Repeat the process for additional bales

tasks.task: Push the loaded wagon with the tractor
subtasks: Ensure the safety chains are tight and secure
Drive the tractor in the desired direction, propelling the wagon
Guide the wagon using the rearview mirrors or by direct observation

tasks.task: Unload the hay from the wagon
subtasks: Bring the wagon to a location where hay needs to be deposited
Apply the brakes on the tractor to stop the machine
Detach the safety chains from the lock pins
Lower the wagon to release the hay
Remove any protective covers or tarps from the hay
Spread the hay out for even distribution
